raw_comment: I notice that China by far leads the world with pollution. So if they lead the U.S in pollution why do all of the diesel engines that go out to them not get emissions controls put on them? I think that since the U.S has to have emissions controls the rest of the world should too.
ace_sentences: I notice that China leads the world in pollution.
China leads the world in pollution by far.
China has more pollution than the United States.
Many diesel engines are sent to China.
These diesel engines do not have emission controls.
I ask why these diesel engines do not have emission controls.
The United States requires emission controls.
I think that the rest of the world should require emission controls too.
